title: Hextec Boxes no display for  (number / timer)  on the new client
body:
I have a question concerning the new client 
On the old client i was able to see how many  boxes i can win a day and when i can get the next one , it is usually displayed on my profile
But on the new one i cant seem to find any indication on how many i can win and when will i be able to get one
Any Indication ? Maybe they changed it somewhere else ?

replies.body: coming with the next patch, in the profile screen too
